content.rendered:
Directed by Hyun Wook Song

Written by Kim Seonsu. Eun-kyeong Yun

Cast Sung-Jae Yook( Lee Seung Cheon16 episodes, 2022 ). Lee Jong-Won( Hwang Tae Yong16 episodes, 2022 ). Chae-Yeon Jung( Na Joo Hee16 episodes, 2022 ). Yeonwoo( Oh Yeo Jin16 episodes, 2022 ). Choi Won-Young( Hwang Hyeon Dounknown episodes ). Son Woo-Hyun( Jang Moon Giunknown episodes ). Kim Kang Min( Park Jang Goonunknown episodes ). Chae-Ah Han( Jin Seon Hyeunknown episodes ). Song Wok-suk(unknown episodes ). Chang Ryul( Seo Jun Taeunknown episodes ). Dae-chul Choi( Lee Cheolunknown episodes ). Yeo-Eun Son( Seo Young Shinunknown episodes ). Shin Joo-Hyup( Park Jin Seokunknown episodes ). Seung You( Lee Seung Ahunknown episodes ). Deok Hee Jo( Park Jae Donunknown episodes )

Language Korean

Producers Kim bo-mi. Ahn Je-hyeon . Shin Sang-yoon . Kwon Mi-kyung

Production Samhwa Networks. Studio N.

Season 1

Episodes 16
